CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Content Creation or Upload stage positioned above or below the Join Group or Community stage?
SRP.A: The Content Creation or Upload stage is positioned {below} the Join Group or Community stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Join Group or Community?
VE.A: The value of stage Join Group or Community is {40}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {198}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Content Creation or Upload?
VE.A: The value of stage Content Creation or Upload is {33}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Share Content, with a value of {198}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Content Creation or Upload, with a value of {33}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community?
SC.A: Decreased by {63} Million Users from stage Follow Account to stage Join Group or Community.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload?
SC.A: Decreased by {7} Million Users from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 150? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 71? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {40}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {33}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 36 and 150? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Follow Account} stage has {103}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {40}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Follow Account} to {Join Group or Community} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to stage {Follow Account} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Share Content} and {Follow Account} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Join Group or Community} and {Content Creation or Upload} stages.
